description: Add support for launch configurations that include encrypted Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS) volumes
Add ``role_session_name`` config variable to control the ``RoleSessionName`` when assuming roles (`issue 1389 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1389>`__)
Handle case when empty list parameter was specified with no value (`issue 838 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/838>`__)
